alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 7:39PM AKST until February 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area including Hydaburg and Craig. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very gusty conditions are expected throughout this time period. Highest wind gusts expected overnight and again Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: People should prepare for possible power outages. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
